fullText: Despite a heartfelt performance by Norbert Leo Butz and a lovely score by Andrew Lippa, this adaptation of Daniel Wallace's novel never finds its theatrical footing.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a heartfelt performance by Norbert Leo Butz and a lovely score by Andrew Lippa, this adaptation of Daniel Wallace's novel never finds its theatrical footing.
